events.name: Back To The Future: Building amazing products easily using TensorFlow
events.description:
Sergii is Google Developer Expert in Machine Learning. In his free time, he organizes Hacking Machine Learning meetup in Munich, that currently has more than 1300 members and hosts monthly events.
Over the weekends he enjoys sharing his knowledge as a conference speaker or open source and machine learning ambassador.

In his work time, he works on democratizing fashion with Stylight, one of the biggest fashion communities in the world. Given more than 30 million products live over more than 1000 shops in 17 countries, using machine learning and data science is one of the ways to make Stylight a great place to discover products.

News are going crazy about AI. Companies, raise hundreds of millions on just mentioning keywords of Artificial Intelligence and Deep Learning. But what does it mean for actual production use-case? Where is the line between the hype and how easy is to apply these technologies?

In the talk, we start with basic concepts of machine learning, explaining tensors and advantages of Tensorflow, shifting more into the direction of practical examples of how one can apply mentioned technologies without going too deep into mathematics.

The talks cover techniques that were announced at TensorFlow Dev Summit this year. With these tools, one can prototype solution fast, without the need to go too deep. Additionally, we also cover, the last mile: how to bring such solutions to the users covering both cluster server serving with TensorFlow Serving as well as mobile serving with Tensorflow Lite and even the brand new MLKit.
events.how_to_find_us: Black building inside Algebra Campus, second floor Algebra LAB

events.name: Podržano/ojačano učenje (reinforcement learning) na primjeru igre Flappy Bird
events.description:
Korištenje DeepMind-ovih revolucionarnih AI pristupa traži dosta truda, ali rezultati su zapanjujući.
Ova prezentacija Vas vodi kroz osnovne dijelove podržanog/ojačanog učenja na primjeru treniranja neuronskih mreža na primjeru igre Flappy bird koristeći PyTorch framework.

Predavanje vodi Neven Pičuljan R&D inženjer u području deep learninga i machine learninga sa nekoliko godina radnog iskustva.
Kroz vrijeme je skupio dosta iskustva u radu sa novim tehnologijama,
a jedan od glavnih framework-a koje trenutno koristi je PyTorch uz što još kombinira C i C++.
events.how_to_find_us: Glavni ulaz u Algebra kampus, žuta zgrada sa lijeve strane prvi ulaz u zgradu i prvi hodnik lijevo dvorana "Ruđer Bošković"

events.name: Photomath - "Od podataka do proizvoda"
events.description:
Photomath - "Od podataka do proizvoda"

Globalno je sve jasnija vrijednost i snaga algoritama Machine Learning-a. U Photomath-u je rano prepoznata ta vrijednost i način na koji takva rješenja mogu doprinijeti proizvodu. Ovdje ćemo pričati kako smo od velikih količina sirovih podataka došli do "State of the Art" rješenja u aplikaciji. Kako smo razvili pipeline za razvijanje Deep Learning rješenja i koji su izazovi s kojima se srećemo. Način na koji od milijuna slika dolazimo do real time on device neuronskih mreža. Te kako naš Machine Learning pipeline koristi naš GPU cluster i kako to ostvarujemo tehnologijama poput TensorFlow-a, Dockera i Kubernetes-a i konačno kako tu infrastrukturu prenijeti na cloud servise.

Ivan Jurin
Ivan je istraživački računalni inženjer u tvrtki Photomath. Jedan je od inženjera zaslužnih za modele strojnog učenja koji čitaju i rješavaju matematičke zadatke u aplikaciji Photomath. Prošlog ljeta završio je FER, gdje se najviše bavio primjenom strojnog učenja u području računalnog vida. U slobodno vrijeme voli planinarenje, putovanja, duge šetnje pješčanim plažama, i naravno, finu hranu uz času dobrog vina.

Leon Rotim
Leon je research/software engineer u tvrtki Photomath. Jedan je od inženjera koji rade razvoju i održavanju machine learning (ML) pipeline-a za razvijanje deep learning rješenja koja se koriste u Photomathu. Diplomirao na FER-u 2016. te od tada radio na fakultetu, Microblinku i trenutno Photomathu. Najviše se bavio optimizacijskim algoritmima, system designom i ML-om na temu Natural Language Processinga (NLP) i Computer Vision-a. U slobodno vrijeme se voli baviti sportom, prvenstveno nogometom, putovanja, kratke šetnje pješčanim plažama, i naravno, finu hranu uz času dobrog vina.

events.name: Google Voice Assistant for Business
events.description:
An interactive presentation is full of statistics, trends & case-studies, Voice Commerce, live Demos, and final networking.

We will talk about the history of the voice industry, statistics in the USA & World, live demos of smart speakers. The second part will be about Voice Search, Voice commerce, and Smart homes & usage in Healthcare & Social areas. In the end, we will talk who to building a voice application.

Our guests will be Martin Krcek and Denis Valasek both Google Developers Experts.

Martin is in global marketing and development for more than 20 years (from IT, healthcare, FMCG, banking to mobile gaming).
He is first Google Developer Expert for Google Assistant in CEE region and since 2018 he had trained more than 980+ professionals and enthusiasts on presentations, workshops, and hackathons.
He is also a Mentor who is helping startups to build and scale great products, with a focus on simplicity and high performance. And also a mentor for students in universities.

Denis is a young software developer interested in new technologies, particularly in Voice Assistants and IoT. While studying grammar school he is also a GDG Ostrava organizer and a GDE for Google Assistant. He works with Google Education Groups to bring new trends and methodology to the Czech education system. By the age of 18, he had already spoken at over 15 events and conferences taught over 100 hours and influenced 500+ people.

https://www.linkedin.com/in/martinkrcek/
https://www.linkedin.com/in/denisvalasek/
events.how_to_find_us: At the main entrance on the Algebra University College Campus, you go left in the yellow building and follow the markings.

events.name: Google Voice Assistant Workshop
events.description:
Our guests will be Martin Krcek and Denis Valasek both Google Developers Experts.

Live coding, Architecture, NLU, SDK Dialogflow & AoG, Deployment, Testing, and connecting to API.
The workshop fits for developers and UX designers.

During the live coding, you will get the knowledge of the architecture of Google Assistant and Alexa Echo, NLU. We will use Actions on Google, Dialogflow, and Firebase to create a working example of a voice app.

Some excellent examples:
- Talking Bank: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WlxF2jd9VQI
- Money Keeper (by women/girls): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vWAxAjK3XNE
- Robot (talk & commands over Firebase): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LsjcD4EhI34

Martin is in global marketing and development for more than 20 years (from IT, healthcare, FMCG, banking to mobile gaming).
He is first Google Developer Expert for Google Assistant in CEE region and since 2018 he had trained more than 980+ professionals and enthusiasts on presentations, workshops, and hackathons.
He is also a Mentor who is helping startups to build and scale great products, with a focus on simplicity and high performance. And also a mentor for students in universities.

Denis is a young software developer interested in new technologies, particularly in Voice Assistants and IoT. While studying grammar school he is also a GDG Ostrava organizer and a GDE for Google Assistant. He works with Google Education Groups to bring new trends and methodology to the Czech education system. By the age of 18, he had already spoken at over 15 events and conferences taught over 100 hours and influenced 500+ people.

https://www.linkedin.com/in/martinkrcek/
https://www.linkedin.com/in/denisvalasek/

To be able to fully participate in the workshop each participant must have a valid Gmail account and has to bring a laptop on the workshop.
events.how_to_find_us: At the main entrance on the Algebra University College Campus, you go left in the yellow building and follow the markings

events.name: Inference engines and one API to rule them all - Visage Technologies
events.description:
Pozdrav svima, 24.10. u 19h nas očekuje još jedan vrlo zanimljiv meetup, dolazi nam ekipa iz Visage Technologies-a s jako zanimljivom temom.

Do tada se družimo na Slack-u (https://gdg-zagreb-slackin.herokuapp.com/), kanal gdg-cloud-zagreb.

http://visagetechnologies.com/

Duboke neuronske mreže okosnica su važnih algoritama implementiranih u SDK-u za praćenje, analizu i prepoznavanje lica koje razvijamo u Visage Technologies. S obzirom na to da je SDK namijenjen efikasnom izvođenju na različitim platformama (od Windowsa, Linuxa i Mac OS-a preko Androida i iOS-a do različitih ugradbenih sustava), potrebni su nam adekvatni mehanizmi zaključivanja (eng. inference engine) koji omogućavaju izvršavanje dubokih mreža. Primjeri takvih mehanizama su OpenVINO, TFLite, NCNN i Visagev in-house inference engine. Ova će prezentacija dati pregled mehanizama zaključivanja te naše iskustvo njihove integracije pod zajednički API.

Speaker-i su Nikola Mrzljak i Jure Pajić.
Nikola dolazi iz Zagreba, gdje radi kao istraživački inženjer u tvrtki Visage Technologies. Radi u odjelu koji se bavi izradom projekata koji koriste VT sustave te u odjelu koji se bavi računalnim vidom.
Prošlo ljeto je završio studij na FER-u gdje se najviše bavio područjem računalnog vida. Iza sebe ima nekoliko godina iskustva rada u C++-u s fokusom na API, računalnu grafiku i igre (OpenGL, Unity) te nekoliko godina iskustva u Pythonu s fokusom na strojno učenje(OpenCV, Tensorflow). U slobodno vrijeme voli odraditi kvalitetan trening, učiti plesati, pjevati u zboru te čitati/slušati knjige.

Jure Pajić je istraživački inženjer na području računarstva i radi u tvrtki Visage Technologies. Radi u istraživačkom odjelu koji se bavi detekcijom, praćenjem i analizom ljudskog lica (procjena spola, dobi, emocija te prepoznavanje ljudskih lica). Ima iskustva na području računalnog vida (OpenCV, Matlab), dubokih neuronskih mreža (PyTorch, TensorFlow) te računalnoj grafici i izradi računalnih igara (Blender, Unity, OpenGL, DirectX). U slobodno vrijeme bavi se sviranjem klavira i učenjem japanskog jezika.

OBAVIJEST:
Na ovom meetup-u nas očekuje i popust za WeAreDevelopers Vienna konferenciju i nekoliko free karata za istu.

https://www.wearedevelopers.com/events/congress-vienna/

Ulaz u crnoj zgradi, 2.kat.

group_profile.intro: We are a community group in Zagreb discovering capability of Google Cloud. We will be focusing on Machine Learning, Kubernates, Cloud Functions, BigQuery but not only to them.
